text: Ezɨ amizim a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ Atrivim Sol amizir bizim gɨfo. A Israelian ariaghirezir gumazibar duaba ko mɨgeiba, ko kukunir gumaziba, a bar me batoghezɨ, me nguazir kam ategha ghue. Nɨ tizim bagha na bagha azuazim adui moghɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam na ganɨdi. Sol na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremeghasa nɨ na gifari.”
